comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Victor Sylvester Saier (May 4, 1891 - May 14, 1967) was a first baseman in Major League Baseball from 1911 to 1919. He played for the Chicago Cubs and the Pittsburgh Pirates.

comment.author: 7441919@N07
comment._content:
Gripping image. 
Wish we had sports photography like this these days.
